title: Qualcomm | Engineer | Bengaluru, India [Declined]
content:
* Education: BTech (CSE)
* Years of Experience: 2+
* Prior Experience: Product Based MNC
* Prev Comp: 34 LPA
* Date of the Offer: 14 Sept 2024
* Company: Qualcomm
* Title/Level: Engineer
* Location: Bengaluru, India
* Salary: 22,00,000/-
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 5,00,000 (Joining) + 1,00,000 (Relocation) 
* Stock bonus: $16,000 USD vested 25% per annum
* Bonus: Upto 30% Performance based
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 22L + 5L + 4.5L (RSU) = ~32 LPA
* Benefits: Standard Qualcomm benefits
* Other details: Offer Rejected as it is less than existing package

title: Flexport | SDE 2 | Bangalore
content:

Education: BTech( CSE )

Company: Flexport
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Remote(Banglore, India)

Prev company - FAANG
Base Salary: 53,00,000

Bonus: 10% every year
